about_the_game: Error: Human Not Found places the player in the role of Grace Fortran, a computer scientist stationed on-board the Noah Sphere, a research station in space. Instead of celebrating the success of the first Artificial Intelligence (AI) being uploaded to a physical android, Grace is racing to clear her name in the death of the AI who was found dead less than 24 hours after the upload. Work together with another AI, Ada, to search for clues, question suspects, and solve four kinds of computer-science related puzzles in this science-fiction visual-novel/puzzle game hybrid. Determine the fate of AIs and their relationship with humanity with three endings to this murder mystery. Unlock databases that give background information about the real-life computer scientists, mathematicians, and roboticists that the characters share names with.
detailed_description: Error: Human Not Found places the player in the role of Grace Fortran, a computer scientist stationed on-board the Noah Sphere, a research station in space. Instead of celebrating the success of the first Artificial Intelligence (AI) being uploaded to a physical android, Grace is racing to clear her name in the death of the AI who was found dead less than 24 hours after the upload. Work together with another AI, Ada, to search for clues, question suspects, and solve four kinds of computer-science related puzzles in this science-fiction visual-novel/puzzle game hybrid. Determine the fate of AIs and their relationship with humanity with three endings to this murder mystery. Unlock databases that give background information about the real-life computer scientists, mathematicians, and roboticists that the characters share names with.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 +
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: ERROR: Human Not Found

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 4th Generation Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4th Generation Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Error: Human Not Found is a visual-novel/puzzle game with portions of point-and-click adventure. Play as Grace and work to uncover the cause of death for the first AI to inhabit a physical body. Solve 4 types of computer-science based puzzles that increase in difficulty as the story progresses.
